description:
Every issue of FamilyFun is filled with YUMMY RECIPES, FUN-FILLED KID CRAFTS, BOREDOM-BUSTING ACTIVITIES and USEFUL TRAVEL TIPS your whole family will love. 
 
And now with digital issues on your iPad, you get all that, plus EXCLUSIVE VIDEOS and BROWSER LINKS TO ONLINE RESOURCES to make it all come to life in a brand new way!  
 
Just look at all you get in every issue ...  
 
• RECIPES – family-pleasing treats and sweets you can all make together, plus healthy options to make them as good for you as they are good to eat!  
 
• CRAFTS – Our best kid-friendly creative craft ideas, plus all the step-by-step make-it-yourself how-to’s they need.  
 
• ACIVITIES – Fun new games and mind-stretching activities that’ll keep the whole family on their toes and asking for more!  
 
• FAMILY GETAWAYS – No matter what your budget, we’ll show you the most fun places to visit, best places to stay and bring you helpful family traveling tips for your most memorable getaways ever.  
 
• BIRTHDAY PARTIES – From magical birthday party ideas to foolproof cakes and fun and inexpensive party favors, you’ll find everything you need to make the big day special!  
 
With everything from the print edition, plus more easy, creative solutions ... more practical, down-to-earth ideas that don’t cost a fortune ... simple approaches, sensible answers, information and inspiration, the new digital edition of FamilyFun brings you more of just what you’re looking for – right at your fingertips.   
 
Subscriptions available:
 
Single issue - $2.99 
 
1-month subscription – 99¢, automatically renewed until cancelled.   
 
1-year subscription - $7.99, automatically renewed until cancelled.   
 
Monthly subscription includes 7-day Free Trial – annual subscription includes 30-day Free Trial.
 
SUBSCRIBERS’ AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL FEATURE: You credit card will automatically be charged for another subscription period (another year for annual subscribers, another month for monthly subscribers) unless you change your subscription preferences in your account settings.
 
iPhone edition does not include interactive features.  For app assistance, tap the “App Support” button or call 1-800-846-4004.  
 
(Remember, the images below are only representative. To see the latest issue, download the application.) 
 
What’s New

To make FamilyFun even better for you, there is a new version of the app for your iPhone and iPad ... 
 
„ To get the April issue, you will need to update your app.
 
„ As part of this update, you’ll need to re-download any issues you’ve already purchased (you will not be charged again). 
 
„ If you are a current print subscriber, you will also need to verify your print subscription within the app.  (Please note: you may need to reset your password.) 
 
As always, if you have any questions, or want assistance in any way, call 1-800-846-4004.  We’re glad to help.
